result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shena M. Heidvogel

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
CASES: 15CM11, 14CM425   KJB- Clerk.Defendant Shena M. Heidvogel in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Daniel P. Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 10:00AM In 14CM425- Ct 2- Def plea of G. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. DRI Ct 1 in 14CM425 and 15CM11. 

SENTENCING: w/h sent, prob 1 yr- appear today, anger mgmt assess, Aboslute Sobriety, AODA assess & comply, no abusive w/Alex Kromrey or K.K., $265.60 fine/cost- $25/mo PP beg 5/1/15 and 1st of e/m thereafter. No DNA surcharge. 10:10am adj.

Not to have contact with: K.J.K.    Not to commit any new crimes.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.   Must appear at all future court appearances.

Defendant Shena M. Heidvogel in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 2:53pm Atty Firkus will be atty. Def- plea of NG. Atty Firkus to contact ADA Tolan. Bond cont. 2:56pm adj.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 24, 2015 at 10:00 am.

CASES: 14CM425 & 15CM11.  Defendant Shena M. Heidvogel in court.  Daniel P. Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:44 pm.  
14CM425-Mr Kromrey also appears to modify no contact order.  Steffen-ask for no abusive contact.  CT modifies bond to no abusive contact with Alexander Kromrey & KK.  1:50 PM ADJ.
Certification that class attended and completed.
Victim request to Amend Bond Condition - Amended to No abusive contact.
